summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 1st Avenue North, from Jackson Street to Hanford Street; by the construction of a street lighting system and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9348 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
